title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file in the Navigator, if the file is already open in the scripted resource editor example, nothing happens.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file in the Navigator, even if the file is already open in the scripted resource editor example, a new editor should be opened using the default text editor.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file 'test.xml'.
3. The file 'test.xml' is opened in the scripted resource editor example.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Note that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active.

Expected: The file 'test.xml' should be opened in a new editor using the default text editor, even if it is already open in the scripted resource editor example.

NOTES:
